name: typescript
description: A collection of TypeScript-focused prompts for Cursor
author: jeremytoce

prompts.name: type-inference
prompts.description: Helps understand and improve TypeScript's type inference system, including better type annotations and complex scenarios

prompts.name: interface-builder
prompts.description: Assists in creating robust TypeScript interfaces with proper property types and inheritance patterns

prompts.name: type-guard
prompts.description: Helps create type guard functions for type narrowing and user-defined type predicates

prompts.name: generics-helper
prompts.description: Guides through generic type parameters, constraints, and generic interface implementation

prompts.name: enum-creator
prompts.description: Assists in creating and documenting enums, including best practices and string literal conversions

prompts.name: utility-types
prompts.description: Helps with TypeScript utility types like Partial, Readonly, Pick, and Record

prompts.name: async-types
prompts.description: Guides through Promise type definitions and async/await type annotations

prompts.name: mapped-types
prompts.description: Assists with creating mapped type definitions and key remapping

prompts.name: declaration-files
prompts.description: Helps create .d.ts files and module declarations

prompts.name: type-assertions
prompts.description: Guides through type assertions, const assertions, and their proper usage
